price: Allah, əcəli çatmış bir nəfsin ölümünü əsla gecikdirməz. Allah nə etdiklərinizdən xəbərdardır.
arabic: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walan yu-akhira al-lahu nafsan idhā jāa ajaluhā wal-lahu khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna
